title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Adjusted cron schedules for GitHub Actions workflows to run Mon-Fri instead of daily, with thematic grouping (e.g., link/content quality on Mondays).
Moved troubleshooting guides (`troubleshooting-secret-scanning.md`, `troubleshooting-dependabot-errors.md`) to reference sections and updated content.
Added version cookie support to remember user's preferred docs version, enhancing homepage redirects and version picker behavior.
summary:

- Moved troubleshooting guides (`troubleshooting-secret-scanning.md`, `troubleshooting-dependabot-errors.md`) to reference sections and updated content.
- Added version cookie support to remember user's preferred docs version, enhancing homepage redirects and version picker behavior.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Adjusted cron schedules for GitHub Actions workflows to run Mon-Fri instead of daily, with thematic grouping (e.g., link/content quality on Mondays).
- Moved troubleshooting guides (`troubleshooting-secret-scanning.md`, `troubleshooting-dependabot-errors.md`) to reference sections and updated content.
- Added version cookie support to remember user's preferred docs version, enhancing homepage redirects and version picker behavior.
